author: alexdma
msg: * First implementation of STANBOL-571 : scopes and session information (which were registered, what ontologies were managed) is now stored in a meta graph and restored upon OntoNet bootstrap. Works for most base scenarios and should be refined from now on.
* Note that sessions are restored in an INACTIVE state, as an initial policy for STANBOL-247 .
* More headers added for accepted methods in OPTIONS preflight requests for Ontology Manager Web (STANBOL-105)
